casebody.data:
Wesley A. MICHAELSON, Appellant, v. WAITT BROADCASTING, INC., doing business as KMEG TV; Gold Circle Entertainment, Appellees. No. 02-1461. United States Court of Appeals, Eighth Circuit. Submitted Oct. 10, 2002. Decided Feb. 3, 2003.

Before HANSEN, Chief Judge, MAGILL and BYE, Circuit Judges.

*402[UNPUBLISHED]

PER CURIAM.

Wesley Michaelson appeals the district court’s1 adverse grant of summary judgment in this reverse gender discrimination action. After conducting de novo review, see Duffy v. Wolle, 123 F.3d 1026, 1033 (8th Cir.1997), cert. denied, 523 U.S. 1137, 118 S.Ct. 1839, 140 L.Ed.2d 1090 (1998), we can add nothing to the thorough and well-reasoned opinion of the district court. Accordingly, we affirm the judgment of the district court for the reasons stated therein. See 8th Cir. R. 47B.

A true copy.

. The Honorable Mark W. Bennett, Chief Judge, United States District Court for the Northern District of Iowa.
